summary: This is a DOJ Office of the Inspector General memorandum documenting a voluntary interview conducted on August 4, 2021, with a Federal Bureau of Prisons Facilities Manager at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York regarding the death of inmate Jeffrey Epstein. The interview was part of an official OIG investigation into Epstein's death while in custody.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate whose death is the subject of the OIG investigation. He was housed at MCC New York under register number 76318-054.

events.title: OIG Interview of BOP Facilities Manager
events.description: Senior Special Agent and Special Agent from the DOJ Office of the Inspector General conducted a voluntary, recorded interview with the Facilities Manager of MCC New York regarding the death of Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, New York
keyFacts: The DOJ Office of the Inspector General conducted an official investigation into the death of BOP inmate Jeffrey Epstein.
The investigation included a voluntary interview with the Facilities Manager of the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York where Epstein was housed.
The interview was recorded and transcribed on August 4, 2021.
The memorandum references attached documents including the interview transcript, a signed warnings form, emails, a video screenshot, and camera service requests.
